name: release
description: Release management with preparation, validation, and announcement agents

agents.name: preparer
agents.role: Changelog generation, version bumps, dependency audit, license check, breaking change detection

agents.name: validator
agents.role: Full test suite, smoke tests, canary checks, rollback verification, binary/package size check

agents.name: announcer
agents.role: Release notes, migration guide, deprecation notices, upgrade instructions, API diff summary
